knimeNode.name: Fix Colum Names
knimeNode.shortDescription: Renames column to give valid data-frame column names. By default this is done by replacing all operator symbols in the intial posistion of the each column name.

fullDescription.intro:
Renames column to give valid data-frame column names.
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki
fullDescription.option: If enabled the node will use the method make.names of R to polish all column names.

ports.inPort: A table which might contains column names that are not compatible with R.
